title: Westwood Top Floor 1BR 1BA PH w/ Balcony, Parking/Spa/Gym
neighborhood: Westwood, UCLA, Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills
posting_body: North Facing Top Floor 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Penthouse Apartment.
This top floor 1 bedroom penthouse apartment offers the following features:

This bright top floor 1 bedroom penthouse apartment is north facing, with hardwood floors in the living room, carpeted bedroom, features include central air/heat, a cozy fireplace, and a private balcony.
Double-glazed window in the bedroom, with lots of light and views overlooking Westwood Village.
Kitchen is equipped with a microwave, a dishwasher, a gas stove/oven and a refrigerator.
Our apartment homes are thoughtfully detailed with lavish amenities including covered parking, an elevator, a garage, fitness center, a laundry facility, and a pool on the roof of our community.
Parking included and extra storage available.
